Title: Under the Skin
Overview: A seductive stranger prowls the streets of Glasgow in search of prey: unsuspecting men who fall under her spell.
Keywords: male nudity, scotland, edinburgh, alien, very little dialogue
production_companies: Scottish Screen, UK Film Council, FilmNation Entertainment, Nick Wechsler Productions, Creative Scotland, British Film Institute, Film4, Silver Reel, JW Films, A24
Cast: Scarlett Johansson, Kryštof Hádek, Paul Brannigan
